sentence: 2022 Midterm Elections More Biden's low approvals worry Democrats campaigning in midterm elections Trump's response to Putin's invasion of Ukraine reveals GOP fissures Democrats seize on GOP Senator Rick Scott's plan to tax more Americans Congressman Colin Allred discusses Democrats' midterm prospects Kevin McCarthy backs Liz Cheney's primary challenger Harriet Hageman More In: texas Aaron Navarro Aaron Navarro is an associate producer for the political unit at CBS News, focusing on House and gubernatorial campaigns as well as the census and redistricting.
author: Aaron Navarro
title: What to watch for in Texas' primary elections
